introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how the Cyprigo mobile application ('App') collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal data. By using the App, you agree to this policy.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following information when you use the Cyprigo app:

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use the data we collect for the following purposes:
items: To provide and improve app services

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties except in the following cases:
items: With our service providers (under confidentiality agreements)
When we have your explicit consent

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Our app may use the following third-party services:

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data. Your data is protected with encryption and stored on secure servers.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to provide our services. When you delete your account, your data will be removed from our systems within a reasonable timeframe.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: Under GDPR and applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:
items: Right to request correction of your data
Right to request deletion of your data
Right to object to data processing

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: The Cyprigo app is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and become aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be published within the app, and notifications will be sent for significant changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our privacy policy or your data, please contact us:
